ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T00:36:28 [Issue ID 4000-823337] urn:comicvine:4000-823337
ComicInfo.Summary:
A new band of Tengu mountain goblins have invaded the northern mountains, a species new to Usagi. Savage and relentless, they are determined to drive the established Tengu out and prey upon the people of the area. For the first time, Usagi must ally himself with yokai to keep the invaders out. The first chapter of a new multi-part story!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Stan Sakai (a) & Hi-Fi Design (c) | 1 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Jon Sommariva | 2 | Note: The digital edition (12/30/2020) for this issue was released before the print edition.

ComicInfo.Title: Tengu War! Part One
